verses.name: Isaiah 1:4
verses.text: Ah sinful nation, a people laden with iniquity, a seed of evildoers, children that are corrupters: they have forsaken the Lord, they have provoked the Holy One of Israel unto anger, they are gone away backward.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:5
verses.text: Why should ye be stricken any more? ye will revolt more and more: the whole head is sick, and the whole heart faint.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:6
verses.text: From the sole of the foot even unto the head there is no soundness in it; but wounds, and bruises, and putrifying sores: they have not been closed, neither bound up, neither mollified with ointment.
